text: Cun az ū noumed şudand, ʙaroi maşvarat ʙa kanore raftand va ʙuzurgtarinaşon guft: «Ojo namedoned, ki padaraton az şumo ʙa nomi Xudo pajmon girifta va peş az in niz dar haqqi Jusuf kūtohī kardaed? Man az in sarzamin ʙerun nameojam, to padar maro ruxsat dihad jo Xudo dar ʙorai man dovari kunad, ki Ū ʙehtarini dovaron ast
